title: Smart Casting (Quick Cast + Normal Cast)
body: I am now using smart cast /quick cast but when i want to do normal cast i press shift + the ability i can do this, however my character stops moving in the process. Is there anyone who would know what to do with the settings in order to make my character move normally during normal cast? Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
There's a setting where it is like quick cast but you can hold the key and see the ability outline for example vi q charging up or xerath q
Look for it called show ability outlines or something... Tick the box
